title: Login with Spotify
text: Login with your Spotify account, to see your library. Exportify will show you your: Playlists, Albums, Artists and Songs. Exportify cannot delete or create anything. It will only read your existing data.

title: Download your library
text: Exportify gives you the ability to download your current library state. Since this app is still in early development, the format of the downloaded data may change over time.

title: Backup your library
text: Exportify also gives you the ability to safe your library online. It is connected to your Spotify ID, so you dont need an additional account. Do not rely on this yet. This is feature is not ready for serious use at this time.
